wikitext.*:
'''KEN''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "see, perceive, note".<ref name=PE>{{PE|Eldarin}}, pp. 156, 187 (root appearing as √KEN)</ref><ref name=VT>{{VT|41a}}, p. 5 (root appearing as √ken)</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''[[kenda-]]'' ("intensive watch, sc. ''not''' guard' but observe for some time (to gain information etc.). Often used for 'reading'")<ref name=PE/><ref name=VT/>
